authors.name: Rohith Soman
authors.about: Rohith Soman is a PhD Student at CeNSE, IISc Bangalore. Mononymously known as Somettan, he is also the current secretary of SIMA. He is pursuing research in the field on GaN transistors.

authors.name: Midhun Ben Thomas
authors.about: He is currently a Post-Doc in Israel.
